description: Emmett and Shaw were getting cozy on the couch while we were interviewing them, and newbie Emmett couldn’t keep his hands to himself. This was his first time doing anything with a guy, but nervous wasn’t a word that best described how he was feeling...it was more like excited to get started on Shaw ass! “I can’t wait to get inside this manly man!” I think it’s safe to say Emmett had a good first time.
title: Emmett & Shaw: Bareback
